content.rendered:
Directed by Abbas Sarfaraz Ratansi. Atif Khan

Cast Vikas Rai( Amit3 episodes, 2022 ). Khushi Dubey( Chikki Sharma2 episodes, 2022 ). Zain Khan( A.C.P. Yashvardhan Chauhan2 episodes, 2022 ). Parimal Bhattacharya( Sham’s Father2 episodes, 2022 ). Ankit Rana( Friend1 episode, 2022 ). Rati Pandey(1 episode, 2022 ). Geeta Tyagi(1 episode, 2022 ). Siddhanth Karnik(1 episode, 2022 ). Sandeep Chatterjee( Jaggi Raja1 episode )

Language Hindi

Producers Gul Khan

Production Gen K Studios.

Certificate 13+

Season 1

Total Episodes 3
